content:
Here's a sample of user stories for keyword search functionality in Cucumber:

Scenario 1: Search for images using keywords

Given a user is on the Pinterest homepage
When the user enters a keyword into the search bar
And clicks the search button
Then the user should see a list of images related to the keyword
And the user should be able to view, save or share the images

Scenario 2: Save an image from search results

Given a user is on the Pinterest homepage
And the user has searched for a keyword
When the user clicks on an image
And clicks the "Save" button
Then the image should be saved to the user's default board

Scenario 3: Filter search results by popularity

Given a user is on the Pinterest homepage
And the user has searched for a keyword
When the user clicks the "Sort by" dropdown
And selects "Popularity"
Then the search results should be sorted by popularity
And the most popular images should be displayed first

Scenario 4: Infinite scrolling through search results

Given a user is on the Pinterest homepage
And the user has searched for a keyword
When the user scrolls down the page
Then more images related to the keyword should be loaded dynamically
And the user should be able to keep scrolling to see more images.
